resources.string: Best playlist for respective subjects which was followed by seniors to gain best marks in less time and efforts
Timeline you should follow in order to attends all the workshops, events, hackathons, Tech and cultural festivals and all other events in order to make your portfolio shine
Suggestions from the college seniors about how to get good marks in respective subjects
Success stories of Toppers and college Influencers so that you can look up for missing Todos in order to make your portfolio shine.
You can ask or see whether someone have asked similar query to get the best possible result
